bibl.title: Cleopatra in Egypt, Europe, and New York. An Introduction.
bibl.note: A brief biography. - European interest in Egypt. - American interest in Egypt and America's own obelisk. - New excavations and discoveries. - Research on Cleopatra and Egyptomania.
bibl.seg: Miles Margaret M., Cleopatra in Egypt, Europe, and New York. An Introduction.
Margaret M. Miles (Ed.), Cleopatra. A Sphinx Revisited (Berkeley, 2011) pp. 1-20, figg. 1-3.
A brief biography. - European interest in Egypt. - American interest in Egypt and America's own obelisk. - New excavations and discoveries. - Research on Cleopatra and Egyptomania.
